Arrow is kneed in the face and goes down hard. He tries to pull Stiller ove=
r by his leg...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:24 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


  STILLER





  Stiller: You bet=
ter tell your friends not to ruin this. I wanted a fair fight and those bas=
tards are ruining it!...



  (Stiller tries to knee Arrow in the face...)
=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:02 PM
    Subject: R=
e: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    Arrow ducks the palm and ste=
ps right into Termitron's shots meant for Stiller. He's hit by them in the =
back and goes down to one knee.

    Burning Hammer stares at Perplex is st=
asis lock while everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He shakes his head...

    =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 6:08 PM
      Subject: Re:=
 Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


      STILLER




      (Stiller i=
s headbutted in the face. He bends over some, wiping mech fluid from his fa=
ce. Then he springs up, thrusting the palm of his hand upwards at Arrow's f=
ace...)

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omeg=
a 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, July 12, 200=
1 1:40 AM
        Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    =
    Arrow is hit but quickly recovers and actually tries to headbutt Stille=
r...

          From: *Orchid* 
   =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001=
 8:33 PM
          Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


   =
       STILLER




          (Stiller ducks the jab and swings a punch at A=
rrow's stomach...)

            F=
rom: Soulstice Omega

            S=
ent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 4:11 AM
            Subject: Re: Chivtrons un=
der attack... again/Clash


            Arrow approaches Stiller and swing =
a right hook at his head...

     =

 Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


              STILLER





       =

essage -----

                To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 11:17 PM
=
                Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


      =
          Arrow looks at Stiller and then at Burning Hammer.

             =
   Arrow: You take Perplex back inside.

                Burning Hammer nod=
s and Arrow approaches Stiller...

                  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                  From: *Orchid* 
                  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
                  Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 10:46 PM
       =
           Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


           =
       STILLER




                  (Stiller's smile grow larger as he wai=
ts for Arrow...)

       =
             From: Soulstice Omega 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
                    Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 1:21 AM
          =
          Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


            =
        Arrow approaches Stiller, looking very angry...

                  =

                      From: *Orchid* 
   =
                   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: =
Saturday, July 07, 2001 8:05 PM
                      Subject: Re: Chivtron=
s under attack... again/Clash


                      STILLER





        =
              (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clu=
tches his fists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller motio=
ns for Arrow to come...)

                        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                        From: Soulstice Omega 
                       =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Saturday, July 0=
7, 2001 6:29 PM
                        Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack=
... again/Clash


                        Arrow ducks the arrow (heehee) an=
d fires back 7 shots at Stiller...

                          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                          From: *Orchid* 
                =
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                          Sent: Satur=
day, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM
                          Subject: Re: Chivtrons=
 under attack... again/Clash


                          MCGOWAN / BARRYMOR=
E / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP





                          (McG=
owan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a missile at Nightlight.)



 =
                         (Barrymore takes one of the energy balls to the ch=
est but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 laser beams at Night=
light.)



                          (Depp is struck by both energy balls, =
taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlight.)



   =
                       (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pin from a =
grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



                  =
        (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



                  =
        (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, attempting to trip =
her up.)



                          (Virgo fires a red energy draining da=
rt at Nightlight...)

aturday, July 07, 2001 2:35 AM

ns under attack... again/Clash


                            Nightlight::

=
                            Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dificul=
ty she could avoid the 
                            attacks of McGowan and =
Stronghold, She fired 2 energy balls to 
                            McGowa=
n, 2 against Barrymore, 2 agaisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
                =
            against Airbomber, 2 agaisnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold.=
 But 
                            she was hit by the combined attack of Bar=
rymore and Stranato, doing 
                            her fell. 

       =
                     She felt stunned and she would be defendless a short w=
hile.
